title: Verification-Guided Context Optimization for Tool Calling via Hierarchical LLMs-as-Editors
summary: Tool calling enables large language models (LLMs) to interact with external environments through tool invocation, providing a practical way to overcome the limitations of pretraining. However, the effectiveness of tool use depends heavily on the quality of the associated documentation and knowledge base context.
